linear.matrix



struct Matrix(T, RowMajor rowMajor = rowMajor) if (is(T == Unqual!T));
Matrix type. The layout can be chosen from row-major and column-major.

this(T[][] payload);
Initialize Matrix with given payload.

this(size_t rows, size_t columns);
this(size_t rows, size_t columns);
Initialize zero Matrix with specified rows and columns;

auto opOpAssign(string op)(in typeof(this) rhs) if (op == "+" || op == "-");
const auto opBinary(string op)(in typeof(this) rhs) if (op == "+" || op == "-");
Addition and subtraction.

auto opOpAssign(string op)(in T rhs) if (op == "*" || op == "/");
const auto opBinary(string op)(in T rhs) if (op == "*" || op == "/");
const auto opBinaryRight(string op)(in T lhs) if (op == "*");
Scaler multiplication.

const auto opBinaryRight(string op)(in RowVector!T lhs) if (op == "*" && !rowMajor);
const auto opBinaryRight(string op)(in RowVector!T lhs) if (op == "*" && rowMajor);
const auto opBinary(string op)(in ColumnVector!T rhs) if (op == "*" && rowMajor);
const auto opBinary(string op)(in ColumnVector!T rhs) if (op == "*" && !rowMajor);
Multiplication with vector.

const auto opBinary(string op)(in typeof(this) rhs) if (op == "*" && rowMajor);
const auto opBinary(string op)(in typeof(this) rhs) if (op == "*" && !rowMajor);
Matrix multiplication.

const auto rows();
The number of rows.

const auto columns();
The number of columns.

inout auto row(in size_t index);
inout auto column(in size_t index);
Get a row/column.

auto byRow();
auto byColumn();
Iterate over rows/columns.

const auto getColumn(in size_t index);
const auto getRow(in size_t index);
Get a row/column.

const auto copy();
deep copy.

auto _rawPayload();
For element-wise special operation.

auto matrix(RowMajor rowMajor = rowMajor, T)(T[][] payload);
Construct matrix from payload.

T[][] transpose(T)(in T[][] payload);
transpose a payload for matrix.

struct Diagonal(T) if (is(T == Unqual!T));
inout(Diagonal!T) diagonal(T)(inout T[] payload) if (is(T == Unqual!T));
auto diagonal(V)(inout V vector) if (is(V : RowVector!T, T) || is(V : ColumnVector!T, T));
Diagonal matrix type.

Scaler multiplication for rows or columns should be translated to the product with Diagonal.

inout this(inout T[] payload);
Initialize Diagonal with payload.

const auto opBinary(string op)(in Diagonal!T rhs);
auto opOpAssign(string op)(in Diagonal!T rhs) if (op == "*" || op == "/" || op == "+" || op == "-");
operation as vector

const auto opBinaryRight(string op)(in T lhs) if (op == "*");
const auto opBinaryRight(string op)(in T lhs) if (op == "/");
scaler multiplication.

const auto opBinaryRight(string op)(in RowVector!T lhs) if (op == "*");
const auto opBinary(string op)(in ColumnVector!T rhs) if (op == "*");
multiplication with vector.

const auto opBinary(string op)(in Matrix!(T, columnMajor) matrix);
